title: What should US do, if have captured pirates?

content: We are a nation that follows the law -- or we are suppose to be anyway. Thus if they attacked a ship sailing under a American flag we bring them back and give them a trial under American laws -- If they where attacking a ship sailing under a different countries flag we turn them over to that country. Really I do not understand what your question is -- this nation has been dealing with pirates since it was founded and its always been under rule of law. --Savage
reply: We are a nation that follows the law -- or we are suppose to be anyway. Really I do not understand what your question is -- this nation has been dealing with pirates since it was founded and its always been under rule of law. --Savage

content: good to hear all is well...... and yep, that be the far away place I was thinking about. You know, a loooooong time ago I had an opportunity to go there to locate (figure out where they go - pre survey work) some roads that were planned for the area. I would have if it were not for my small daughter who I was rasing. They said fish was plenty and the supply plane would arrive once a week. I figured it meant, if you want to live you will need to fish and don't rely on the plane. But I do think it would have been a good experience... to meet with some of you folks, learn a little bit of the language and learn to like roe..... NOT!!! One Flag......One Heart......One Nation............EVERMORE

content: Blackbeard married an Ormond, but I won't defend even him!! Pirates are Mercenary Terrorists and Murderers, despite the recent Disney Films glorifying them - - They should be very publicly hanged, with the pictures clearly published and sent or dropped as leaflets in they area they come from - - Then as Commodore Decatur once did with the USS Intrepid, the US Navy should sweep into Port after Port and lay waste to all means of these brigands and butchers to mount any more such raids - - NO QUARTER!! Wandering and Wondering

content: good to hear all is well...... and yep, that be the far away place I was thinking about. You know, a loooooong time ago I had an opportunity to go there to locate (figure out where they go - pre survey work) some roads that were planned for the area. I would have if it were not for my small daughter who I was rasing. They said fish was plenty and the supply plane would arrive once a week. I figured it meant, if you want to live you will need to fish and don't rely on the plane. But I do think it would have been a good experience... to meet with some of you folks, learn a little bit of the language and learn to like roe..... NOT!!! One Flag......One Heart......One Nation............EVERMORE

You know, a loooooong time ago I had an opportunity to go there to locate (figure out where they go - pre survey work) some roads that were planned for the area. I would have if it were not for my small daughter who I was rasing. They said fish was plenty and the supply plane would arrive once a week. I figured it meant, if you want to live you will need to fish and don't rely on the plane. But I do think it would have been a good experience... to meet with some of you folks, learn a little bit of the language and learn to like roe..... NOT!!! One Flag......One Heart......One Nation............EVERMORE
title: What should US do, if have captured pirates?

content: quote: Originally posted by LineDoggie: After a Drumhead Trial, the Gibbet. That is what international law says to do with pirates after all. That hasn't changed much since the time of Blackbeard.
quote: Originally posted by LineDoggie: After a Drumhead Trial, the Gibbet.
reply: That is what international law says to do with pirates after all. That hasn't changed much since the time of Blackbeard.
title: What should US do, if have captured pirates?

content: Hang 'em high. With trial or not, just make sure that they receive a "permanent docking place" afterward.
reply: Hang 'em high. With trial or not, just make sure that they receive a "permanent docking place" afterward.
title: What should US do, if have captured pirates?

content: Blackbeard married an Ormond, but I won't defend even him!! Pirates are Mercenary Terrorists and Murderers, despite the recent Disney Films glorifying them - - They should be very publicly hanged, with the pictures clearly published and sent or dropped as leaflets in they area they come from - - Then as Commodore Decatur once did with the USS Intrepid, the US Navy should sweep into Port after Port and lay waste to all means of these brigands and butchers to mount any more such raids - - NO QUARTER!! Wandering and Wondering

title: What should US do, if have captured pirates?

content: Mrmixitup- what right do we have to try them under American law? Are they American citiziens? Did the incident happen on American lands? True it was on an American ship, if it was flagged by the US. What are the laws on piracy? By the time it is over you're liberal view sharing lawyers will have this man spending less then 18 months, in a nice climate controlled jail, eating 3 good meal a day, and then return him to Somailia to start up again.
